00018 using namespace std;
00028 template<typename LockType = NullLock>
00029 class bucket_chain_ {   
00030         size_t bucketSize_;
00031 public:
00032         char *str;
00033         long fpos;
00034         int num;
00035         bucket_chain_* next;
00036         bool isLoaded;
00037         bool isDirty;           
00038         long nextfpos;  
00039         int level;
00040         
00041         //It indicates how many active bucket_chains in memory.
00042         //It increases when allocateBlock() called, or reading from disk,
00043         //and decreases when unload() called. 
00044         static size_t activeNum;
00045 private:        
00046         static LockType fileLock_;
00047 
00048 public:
00052         bucket_chain_(size_t bucketSize) :
00053         bucketSize_(bucketSize) {
00054                 str = NULL;
00055                 num = 0;
00056                 next = 0;
00057                 isLoaded = false;
00058                 isDirty = true;
00059                 fpos = 0;
00060                 nextfpos = 0;
00061                 
00062                 level = 0;                              
00063                 //++activeNum;
00064         }
00065     
00069         virtual ~bucket_chain_() {
00070                 /*if( str ){
00071                         delete str;
00072                         str = 0;
00073                 }*/                     
00074                 unload();
00075                 isLoaded = false;
00076                 //--activeNum;
00077         }
00078 
00082         bool write(FILE* f) {
00083                 if (!isDirty) {
00084                         return true;
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 if (!isLoaded) {
00088                         return true;
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 if (!f) {
00092                         return false;
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 //cout<<"write fpos="<<fpos<<endl;
00096                 if ( 0 != fseek(f, fpos, SEEK_SET) )
00097                 return false;
00098 
00099                 if (1 != fwrite(&num, sizeof(int), 1, f) ) {
00100                         return false;
00101                 }
00102                 //cout<<"write num="<<num<<endl;
00103 
00104                 size_t blockSize = bucketSize_ - sizeof(int) - sizeof(long);
00105                         
00106                 if (1 != fwrite(str, blockSize, 1, f) ) {
00107                         return false;
00108                 }
00109 
00110                 //long nextfpos = 0;
00111 
00112                 if (next)
00113                 nextfpos = next->fpos;
00114 
00115                 //cout<<"write nextfpos = "<< nextfpos<<endl;
00116                 if (1 != fwrite(&nextfpos, sizeof(long), 1, f) ) {
00117                         return false;
00118                 }
00119 
00120                 isDirty = false;
00121                 isLoaded = true;
00122 
00123                 return true;
00124         }
00125         
00126 
00130         bool read(FILE* f) {
00131                 if (!f) {
00132                         return false;
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 //cout<<"read from "<<fpos<<endl;
00136                 if ( 0 != fseek(f, fpos, SEEK_SET) )
00137                 return false;
00138 
00139                 if (1 != fread(&num, sizeof(int), 1, f) ) {
00140                         return false;
00141                 }
00142                 
00143                 //cout<<"read num="<<num<<endl;
00144                 size_t blockSize = bucketSize_ - sizeof(int) - sizeof(long);
00145                 
00146                 if ( !str )
00147                 {
00148                         str = new char[blockSize];              
00149             memset(str, 0, blockSize);
00150                 }
00151  
00152                 //cout<<"read blocksize="<<blockSize<<endl;
00153                 if (1 != fread(str, blockSize, 1, f) ) {
00154                         return false;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 //long nextfpos = 0;
00158 
00159                 if (1 != fread(&nextfpos, sizeof(long), 1, f) ) {
00160                         return false;
00161                 }
00162 
00163                 //cout<<"read next fpos="<<nextfpos<<endl;
00164                 if (nextfpos !=0) {
00165                         if( !next )next = new bucket_chain_(bucketSize_);
00166                         next->fpos = nextfpos;
00167                 }
00168                 isLoaded = true;
00169                 isDirty = false;                
00170                                 
00171                 ++activeNum;
00172                 
00173                 return true;
00174         }
00175 
00179         bucket_chain_* loadNext(FILE* f) {              
00180                 if (next && !next->isLoaded) {  
00181                         //cout<<"reading next"<<endl;
00182                         fileLock_.acquire_write_lock();
00183                         next->read(f);  
00184                         fileLock_.release_write_lock();
00185                 }               
00186                 if( next )next->level = level+1;
00187                 return next;
00188         }
00189         
00194         void unload(){                  
00195                 if(str){
00196                         delete str;
00197                         str = 0;                        
00198                         --activeNum;                    
00199                 }       
00200                 isLoaded = false;
00201                 
00202                 //cout<<"unload fpos="<<fpos<<endl;
00203                 //cout<<"activeNode: "<<activeNum<<endl;
00204         }
00205 
00209         void display(std::ostream& os = std::cout) {            
00210                 os<<"(level: "<<level;
00211                 os<<"  isLoaded: "<<isLoaded;
00212                 os<<"  bucketSize: "<<bucketSize_;
00213                 os<<"  numitems: "<<num;
00214                 os<<"  fpos: "<<fpos;
00215                 if(next)os<<"  nextfpos: "<<next->fpos;
00216                 //os<<"str: "<<str;
00217                 os<<")- > ";            
00218                 if (next)
00219                         next->display(os);
00220         }
